titles.title: Supporting the designation of the week of August 26 through August 30, 2024, as the second annual "National Community Health Worker Awareness Week".
Supporting the designation of the week of August 26 through August 30, 2024, as the second annual "National Community Health Worker Awareness Week".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

bill.summary: This resolution expresses support for the goals and ideals of National Community Health Worker Awareness Week.
